article.title: Multiple Vendors Support U.S. Air Force Engineering Integration
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Booz Allen Hamilton Incorporated, McLean, Virginia; CACI Enterprise Solutions Incorporated, Chantilly; Virginia, Deloitte Consulting, Alexandria, Virginia; Dynamics Research Corporation, Andover, Massachusetts; Science Applications International Corporation, McLean, Virginia; and Tech Team Government Solution Incorporated, Chantilly, Virginia, were awarded a U.S. Air Force contract worth $460 million. This contract will provide for enterprise-level engineering integration and service management support worldwide for Air Force customers. At this time, $15,000 has been obligated to each company.
